description:
Our goal is to unite researchers and gas companies to create an ecosystem that will bring gas technologies up to a qualitatively new level. To improve the environment, to optimise the consumption of natural resources, and to reduce the production costs of valuable compounds.

RusGas is a promising technological project that opens the possibllity for everyone to make contribution to the scientific progress in one of the most important and profitable spheres in the 21st century. And also to take part in improving the environmental situation and preserving the planet's species diversity.
name: Rusgas Infinity
